TEI.2.document_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1922: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1928), 3 vols., Vol 2, pp. 917
TEI.2.document_title: Stephen F Austin to James F Perry, 01-20-1833

barker_notes.barker_summary: Austin to James F. Perry, January 20, 1883. Anxious to sell land to pay pressing debts. Intends to " wash hands of politics."
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 917

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to James F. Perry, January 20, 1883. Anxious to sell land to pay pressing debts. Intends to " wash hands of politics."*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**date_mentioned n="01-20-1833">Jany 20. 1833*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*Dr *person_mentioned*Brother*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*I am anxious to hear how *person_mentioned*Emily */person_mentioned*is satisfied at your *location_mentioned*new home */location_mentioned*and how you are getting on. I do hope you are all satisfied*/p*.
*p*I am trying to worry through [a very] troublesome business, and if I could sell some land so as to raise about $2000 I could get along untill *date_mentioned n="Fall-1833">next fall*/date_mentioned*. I owe a balance yet to *person_mentioned*Hunter */person_mentioned*on acct of what was paid to *person_mentioned*Tennille */person_mentioned*out of the *location_mentioned*store */location_mentioned*which he says he must have *date_mentioned n="02-XX-1833">next month*/date_mentioned* as he is going away. The balance due is $1600. I will sell any land I have to get rid of that and some other debts that are harrassing me. I mean to wash my hands of the politics of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned* and try to settle myself along side of you. I will send down your deed for the place where you live. I have extended the tract *location_mentioned*to the river*/location_mentioned* so as to give you a front of 2000 varas on the river— farewell.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*[Addressed:] *person_mentioned*Mr. James F. Perry*/person_mentioned* *location_mentioned*Peach point below Brazoria.*/location_mentioned**/p*
*/div1*
